favourite.article: We are full of joy! How glorious!!
We sang this song to the Lord today at the Lord's table. Jesus Christ in us, zoe life He is.
That we, That we, That me, That we have Jesus Christ in us!
I love this happy catchy tune for children. I play the ukulele as I sing. They love the song.
He is the only life! Everything outside of Christ is death. He chose us to be in the only reality in the universe!
Praise the Lord!! The Lord woke me up by this wonderful song this morning! Hallelujah :)
Hallelujah, praise the Lord. It's this life that makes us want to shout Hallelujah, praise the Lord!!! Praise You Lord! Praise You Lord!
He is the LIFE, and we are full of JOY! Praise the Lord!
Praise Him that we can enjoy Him as the eternal life!
Praise the Lord for the life within us.
